Content:
[dscrd-hush] <ITM> @Roxin Maybe, but I think most likely they never secure the eth server where the node was running.
- Either they never patch the server
- SSL login was guessed
- Bug in the code that allowed sql inject query to execute

I lost  ~2000 stuck hush and had 5000 hush in sell trades and 0.02 with buy orders. Total of 7000hush + 0.02 btc. I refill supply at 1000 sats x 12000. so lost was less then $300.
